mapper.select: SELECT r.id, r.rentDate, r.returnDate, r.periodDate, r.memberId, b.title, b.status FROM rent as r INNER JOIN book as b ON r.bookId = b.id WHERE r.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE rent as r INNER JOIN book as b ON r.bookId = b.id SET b.status = '대여불가' WHERE r.bookId = #{bookId} AND b.status = '대여가능'
